# mouseInput

**Instance Property**

The controller profile for the mouse device.

## Declaration

```swift
var mouseInput: GCMouseInput? { get }
```

## Discussion

Get the mouse’s current state, and input values for its buttons and scroll wheel, from this object.
title: mouseInput
